document_data.name: Illistyl Elventree
document_data.mainbody: '''Illistyl Elventree''' ({{Pronounce|IL|iss|til|_|EL|ven|tree|refs=}}) was one of the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]] from [[Shadowdale]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Abilities: In addition to being a [[mage]], Illistyl was a novice [[psionicist]]. She possessed the minor psionic devotions ''[[animal telepathy]]'', ''[[body equilibrium]]'', and ''[[empathy (psionic)|empathy]]''.
document_data.History:
Illistyl was born in [[Shadowdale]]. She first met the Knights while they were searching for a [[weretiger]] that had killed the thief [[Alura Durshavin]]. [[Doust Sulwood]], at that time the Lord of Shadowdale, allowed her to live in the [[Twisted Tower of Ashaba]] after her parents died fighting with [[Zhent]] forces.

She was tutored in the magic arts by [[Jhessail Silvertree]] and when her teacher became pregnant, Illistyl replaced her among the Knights. After Jhessail's child was born, Illistyl quickly stepped down and acted as baby-sitter for the young one while the mother returned to fight. She later took care of the magical needs of the Dalesfolk in place of the deceased [[Sylune]].
